name: GetArCodes
description:
Retrieve AR codes for a management company.

Fetches all AR codes associated with a specific management company, useful for property management and financial operations.

parameters.name: client_subdomain
parameters.description: Client subdomain, used to specify the management company.

parameters.name: authentication_type
parameters.description: Specify the authentication type, expected value is 'apikey'.

parameters.name: ar_codes_method_name
parameters.description: Must be set to 'getArCodes' to specify the API method for retrieving AR codes.

parameters.name: response_identifier
parameters.description: An arbitrary string value used to relate the request with the response.

value_schema.description: an arbitary value to relate with response.

parameters.name: api_method_version
parameters.description: Specifies the version of the API method to use. Supported value is 'r1'.

parameters.name: property_id
parameters.description: Optional. Provide a valid property ID for which AR codes are required.

value_schema.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts single value. Provide a valid propertyid.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Entrata API

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: an arbitary value to relate with response.

value_schema.description: an arbitary value to relate with response.

parameters.name: method.params.propertyId
parameters.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts single value. Provide a valid propertyid.

value_schema.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts single value. Provide a valid propertyid.
